title: Men.of.War.Assault.Squad.2.Airborne-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Men.of.War.Assault.Squad.2.
                            Airborne-KaOs ]-           
                                                       
Language:-----------------[ English ]-                 
                                                       
Archive/Count/Volume:-----[ RAR 70x15MEG = 987MEG ]-   
                                                       
Release/Date:-------------[ 05-06-2015 ]-              
                                                       
Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                
                                                       
Iso/Crack:----------------[ Reloaded ]-                
                                                       
Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Nothing ]-                 
                                                       
Movie/Recode:-------------[ Untouched ]-               
                                                       
Audio/Recode:-------------[ Rebuild ]-                 
                                                       
Texture/Recode:-----------[ Rebuild ]-                 
                                                       
Rebuild/Temp/Space:-------[ Estimated 7GIG Free ]-     
                                                       
Final/Used/Space:---------[ 2.72GIG ]-                 
                                                       



Step-1:-------[ UnRAR Yourself Or Use Our Install.exe ]-        
                                                                
Step-2:-------[ Run ~Unpack~.bat As Administrator               
                To Unpack/Rebuild ]-                            
              ( Our Install.exe Does This Step For You )        
                                                                
Step-3:-------[ Click mowas_2.exe To Play                       
                Or Use The Created Desktop Shortcut ]-          
                                                                
                                                                
Time: About 20 Mins On A SSD                        8 Cores [*] 
                                                    4 Cores [ ] 
                                                                
                                                                
**WARNING**                                                     
                                                                
Game Has A Deep Directory Structure, It Must Be Installed To A  
Short Path Otherwise Files Will Fail To Unpack.                 
(The Install.exe Default Location Is Fine)                      
After The Rebuilding Process The Game Can Be Moved To A Prefered
Location.                                                       
                                                                
                                                                
Game Notes:                                                     
                                                                
A Standalone release as most of the base game data has been     
updated Men of War: Assault Squad 2 - Airborne is the second DLC
for AS2. It comes with a set of new features and additional     
singleplayer content. Fight as airborne commander behind enemy  
lines and support allied landing operations The success of these
operations will depend solely on you!                           
                                                                
Finally, you will be able to fight against bots in multiplayer  
matches through LAN or online with friends. New ranked          
statistics for bot matches allow you to keep track of your      
progress. Level up faster with XP bonuses for friends and       
increase the difficulty of your opponents for bigger challenges!
                                                                
Key features:                                                   
* Multiplayer bots for LAN, internet games and match-making     
  in four difficulty modes                                      
* New personal statistics for bot matches                       
* 5 new singleplayer skirmishes in which you fight as a stealth 
  and airborne commander                                        
                                                                
                                                                
Notes:                                                          
                                                                
                                                                
We Recommend Installing To A Short Path (Like The Install.exe   
Default) As Long Path Names Can Cause Missing Files On Certain  
Games During Rebuild.                                           
Unless You Changed It The Default Extraction Folder Install.exe 
Creates Is C:/Games/                                            
This Is Were You Can Find The Games exe.                        
                                                                
-> If Install/Rebuild Seems To Freeze Leave It Alone <-         
This Is Caused By Temp Files Been Created Or Relocated          
And Can Take Alot Of Time Depending On The Size Of The Game.    
                                                                
Install/Rebuild Is Normally Very Time/Space Consuming.          
(So Ensure You Have Pleanty Of Space And Patience)              
                                                                



                                                              
**FALSE-POSITIVES**                                           
                                                              
In Some Cases Some Of Our Tools May Get Detected As Suspicious
Or As A Virus By Some Antivirus Software. This Is Also The    
Case With Some Cracks/NoDVDs. We Assure You This Is A False   
Possitive And All Our Files Are Clean. If Any Of These Files  
Are Deleted The Chances Are The Game Will Not Start Or Will   
Function Incorrectly.                                         
                                                              
**GAME-FAILED?**                                              
                                                              
If You Are Left With Empty Folders You Have More Than Likely  
Run Out Of Temporary Hard Drive Space For Decompression.      
Free Up Alot More Space And Reinstall.                        
                                                              
If You Are Missing Textures Or Audio Your Antivirus Has More  
Than Likely Deleted One Of Our Tools, Disable Your AV And     
Install Again.                                                
                                                              
If The Game Will Simply Not Start Check Minimum Requirements, 
Update All Your Drivers, Check Our Extras Folder For Missing  
Drivers Or Reg Data What May Have Failed To Install. Also     
Make Sure Your Antivirus Has Not Deleted The Crack/NoDVD      
Or Anything Else It Shouldnt Have
